column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The service was good
column2: but that was about it. Kids meal has WAY too much food for a kid. Ordered the shrimp wonton ramen and it had no flavor. The crispy chicken didn't have any flavor unless it was dipped in soy sauce. Spicy tuna taco filling was good
column3: but the shells tasted a bit stale. Highly disappointed.
